channel.title: Home on The openMobility working group will drive the evolution and broad adoption of mobility modelling and simulation technologies.
channel.description: Recent content in Home on The openMobility working group will drive the evolution and broad adoption of mobility modelling and simulation technologies.

item.title: Foundation of the openMobility Working Group
item.author: chris.guindon@eclipse-foundation.org (Christopher Guindon)
item.description: We are very happy to official announce the foundation of the openMobility Working Group with the founding partners: BOSCH, German Aerospace Center (DLR), Fraunhofer FOKUS and Vector Informatik.

item.title: SUMO User Conference 2019
item.author: chris.guindon@eclipse-foundation.org (Christopher Guindon)
item.description: This international conference about Eclipse SUMO is intended for participants from the industry, practitioners as well as academic researchers. It aims on presenting new and unique results in the field of mobility simulation and modelling using openly available tools and data. We expect a large variety of research topics and usage approaches.

item.title: openMobility Eclipse Working Group Kick-Off
item.author: chris.guindon@eclipse-foundation.org (Christopher Guindon)
item.description: Kick-Off meeting for the openMobility Working Group during the SUMO User Conference 2019.

item.title: Eclipse SUMO
item.author: chris.guindon@eclipse-foundation.org (Christopher Guindon)
item.description: Traffic simulations facilitate the evaluation of infrastructure changes as well as policy changes before implementing them in the real world. For example, the effectiveness of environmental zones in cities or the efficiency of traffic light control algorithms can be tested and optimized in a traffic simulation before being deployed in the real world. Eclipse Simulation of Urban Mobility (SUMO) is a free and open traffic simulation toolsuite. SUMO allows modelling and analyzing intermodal traffic systems, including road vehicles, public transport, cargo logistics and pedestrians.

item.title: Release of Eclipse SUMO 1.2.0
